entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain and risk of a thunderstorm. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
